The Wizard Of Conversion Avant-Garde:
To enter the main class of a great amount of energy of the soul. Although You won the bridle of the soul through Mimir's Elixir, not so easy to practice.
You will have the power to transform, you must clear. The dark Wizard will perform the ritual of purification with Mimir's Elixir. You will find it in the Valley of the Dragon.
When you will find the power to transform, visit wizard subclass. Then come back to me, and I'll return your main class.
